name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂ [eWqiZHIoOjk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Crowd excitement and venue overview at Saitama Super Arena before the performance.
Intro sequence and transition to the song performance.

subtitles.original: Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 SPECTRA of NOVA
subtitles.english: Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 SPECTRA of NOVA

subtitles.original: 雲も土埃も 駆け引き上手な大人
subtitles.english: Clouds and dust clouds, adults who are good at bargaining

subtitles.original: だめね そんな言葉 信用できない
subtitles.english: It's no good, I can't trust such words

subtitles.original: 手垢で書いてきて 進化し続けるテクノロジー
subtitles.english: Written with fingerprints, technology that continues to evolve

subtitles.original: 伝えて 人肌の温もり
subtitles.english: Tell me, the warmth of human skin

subtitles.original: ねぇ このままずっと 降り止まない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: Hey, like this forever, it's a world of never-ending rain

subtitles.original: もう 悲しくない 人は慣れる生き物だから
subtitles.english: I'm not sad anymore, because people are creatures of habit

subtitles.original: そう 白紙になった 青春の何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: Yeah, it became a blank page, what page of youth was it again?

subtitles.original: 今 君に会いたいと 涙流して
subtitles.english: Now, wanting to see you, I'm shedding tears
